name: Logging on the Stackdriver exported Bucket is disabled
description: Checks to ensure that logging is enabled on a Stackdriver exported Bucket. Enabled logging provides information about all the requests made on the bucket.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where cloud.type = 'gcp' AND api.name= 'gcloud-storage-buckets-list' AND json.rule = '($.logging does not exist or $.logging equals null) and ($.acl[*].email exists and $.acl[*].email contains logging)'
recommendation:
1. Make a note of the reported Storage buckets which have Stackdriver Logs
2. To enable Access and Storage Logs (using GSUTIL or JSON API) for identified Storage Bucket, see the section 'Enable logging for your bucket' in GCP documentation here: https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/access-logs
